title: Unifying Electromagnetism Gravity and Quantum Geometry via Incompressible Hydrodynamics
description: We present a unified field theory based on the hydrodynamics of an inviscid, incompressible, director-bearing fluid substrate. We demonstrate that Relativistic kinematic effects emerge naturally from circulation conservation: proper time dilation is derived as a function of fluid circulation , while effective mass arises from rotational kinetic energy density . We identify the photon not as a point particle, but as a propagating torsion wave (shear wave) within this substrate, predicting a vacuum Faraday effect  recently supported by experimental data on optical magnetic torques (Assouline & Capua, 2025).
